channel.title: Fixed kthx
channel.description: Not sure how to make one, I know the main class is server. But I don't know how a compilier would work, and for this server, the packaging is different then most servers. So Idk

Let’s stay respectful and on-topic, please.

item.title: Fixed kthx
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

Batch files (.bat) are just scripts for Windows’ Command Prompt. Open up the command prompt and play around with compiling and executing Java programs from there. It will help you understand how to write a “compile.bat” and “run.bat”.

Read full topic

item.title: Fixed kthx
item.dc:creator: @Skrillex_Craft Skrillex_Craft
item.description:
@Skrillex_Craft wrote:

[quote=“Docent, post:3, topic:534257”][quote author=Skrillex_Craft link=topic=653055.msg4375948#msg4375948 date=1382054548]

Not sure how to make one, I know the main class is server. But I don’t know how a compilier would work, and for this server, the packaging is different then most servers. So Idk
[/quote]for a 552 server:
@echo off title Compiler :build cls "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_25\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d deps/Data/CompiledFiles source\server\model\items\*.java source\server\model\minigames\*.java source\server\model\npcs\*.java source\server\model\objects\*.java source\server\model\players\*.java source\server\model\players\skills\*.java source\server\model\players\packets\*.java source\server\model\shops\*.java source\server\net\*.java source\server\task\*.java source\server\util\*.java source\server\world\*.java source\server\util\log\*.java source\server\*.java source\server\clip\*.java source\server\world\map\*.java source\server\clip\region\*.java source\server\model\players\Content\*.java pause goto :build

thats a source compiler

run.bat

@echo off title Alliance Of Hell - Running! echo Reading Compiled Files....They're located in deps/Data/CompiledFiles "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m -cp deps/data/CompiledFiles;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

May I ask what 552 source this is?[/quote]lol dont know since ive alot of sources here most off em dont run but i keep em so i can do changes on the source i run ^^

all files are called broken was back 2 yrs ago and found this on the pc i used tht year ^^

Read full topic

Not sure how to make one, I know the main class is server. But I don’t know how a compilier would work, and for this server, the packaging is different then most servers. So Idk

thats a source compiler

run.bat

@echo off title Alliance Of Hell - Running! echo Reading Compiled Files....They're located in deps/Data/CompiledFiles "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m -cp deps/data/CompiledFiles;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/quote]
